title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 20.16 - Notice of recorded lien
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 20.16 - Notice of recorded lien

State Regulations

When a proper application for a title, which indicates a
lien or liens, or a proper notice of lien is received, the lien or liens will
be recorded by the department and will be noted on the certificate of title
which is issued. In addition, a notice of recorded lien (Form MV-901) will be
sent to the lienholder. This document must be retained by the lienholder since
it is to be used for indicating satisfaction of the lien, succession of
interest to the ownership of the vehicle or the assignment of the security
interest. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
20.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
